generated_body: In the article titled "The biggest wastes of money in 2019," the user can expect an analytical overview of financial expenditures deemed inefficient or unnecessary during that year. The piece is likely to highlight specific examples of extravagant spending by governments, corporations, or individuals, possibly including case studies or statistics to illustrate the impact of these expenditures. Additionally, it may explore the implications of such wastefulness on broader economic trends or public policy. The article could also touch on lessons learned from these financial missteps, though the exact focus remains uncertain.
